contents:
A tiny, far away from China, can't let me get loca...


No intension of finding anyone. Anyway don't need to explain. Why I have to seek you out in particular? Why you? Interesting thought! If you want to settle comfortable in an more advance country like Europe, US or Canada, you really need to put some efforts on English and some technical skills. Driving Uber or serving tables will not make you achieve your life goals.
